transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+5% Ally Team Defense
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+5% Ally Team Defense
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Fiery Tempest Kick
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. When attacking while granted a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>. Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Grants Increased Critical Hit Chance for 1 turn

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Recovers Health of the caster by 20%

description: Attacks an enemy. When attacking while granted a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000071_1_2]</color>. Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.

SKT_SECOND.name: Are You Strong?!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect) When hit by an attack that targets all enemies, grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

(Triggered Effect) When an ally scores or takes a critical hit, activates <color=#28d9ed>Are You Strong?!</color> on the <color=#28d9ed>enemy with the highest Attack</color>.
Damage dealt increases proportional to Defense instead of Attack. Recovers Health and increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description:
(Passive Effect) When hit by an attack that targets all enemies, grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000071_2_5] turn(s)</color>.

(Triggered Effect) When an ally scores or takes a critical hit, activates <color=#28d9ed>Are You Strong?!</color> on the <color=#28d9ed>enemy with the highest Attack</color>.
Damage dealt increases proportional to Defense instead of Attack. Recovers Health and increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000071_2_2]</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Ascending Diamond Fist
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. When an enemy is defeated, <color=#28d9ed>resets</color> the skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Are You Strong?!</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack and additionally increases proportional to missing Health.
description: Attacks an enemy, and grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000071_3_1] turn(s)</color>. When an enemy is defeated, <color=#28d9ed>resets</color> the skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Are You Strong?!</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack and additionally increases proportional to missing Health.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack, and during the Skill Chain attack, increases Accuracy of all allies.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack, and during the Skill Chain attack, increases Accuracy of all allies.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
